      • getPlayers

        public ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers(java.lang.String search)
        Search for multiple player matches. If there is an identical match, nothing else will be searched. If there is multiple ignored case matches, partials will not be matched. Else it will match all partials.
        Parameters:
        search - the search query
        Returns:
        a list of partial matches

      • getPlayersWithPermission

        public static ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayersWithPermission(java.lang.String... permissions)
        Returns a list of players who have all of the given permissions.
        Parameters:
        permissions - a collection of permissions any player in the return list must have. Supplying no permissions will return the source list.
        Returns:
        a KList of players

      • getPlayersWithoutPermission

        public static ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayersWithoutPermission(java.lang.String... permissions)
        Returns a list of players who do not have all of the given permissions.
        Parameters:
        permissions - a collection of permissions any player in the return list cannot have. Supplying no permissions will return the source list.
        Returns:
        a KList of players

      • getPlayers

        public static ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KList<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getPlayers(ninja.bytecode.shuriken.collections.KListAdapter<org.bukkit.entity.Player,org.bukkit.entity.Player> adapter)
        Get a list of players who match the given adapter. Source list comes from all players currently connected.
        Parameters:
        adapter - the KList adapter to determine if the player should be adapted to the next list. If the adapter returns null instead of the source player, it will not be added to the list.
        Returns:
        the adapted list of players

        Returns:
